text: Pen bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok sek, Juda polis okok sek kɨli nop nɨŋɨd, suk awl agɨl agɨlak, Nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lem kumaŋ. Nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lem kumaŋ agɨlak. Agelak Paylat kɨlop agak, Nɨbi ke nop dad amɨl, mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lem kumaŋ agak. Yad tap tɨmel olap gup ak ma pɨyow nepin agak.
